# Rice Noodles

(early draft)

* 16 oz rice flour
* 16 oz tapioca starch (also called "tapioca flour")
* 3 tbsp canola oil
* 1 tsp salt
* 2.5 cups of boiling water

Mix all in stand mixer (on low) for 10 minutes
